Class Storage

  • java.lang.Object
    • Storage
  • public class Storage
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a Storage which deals with loading tasks from the file and saving tasks in the file.

    • Method Detail

      • load

        public java.util.List<Task> load​(Parser parser,
                                 Ui ui)
                          throws java.io.IOException,
                                 InexistentDateException
        Returns the tasks list initialized with the data in the data file.
        Parameters:
        parser - Parser which deals with making sense of the user command.
        ui - Ui which deals with the interactions with the user.
        Returns:
        the tasks list initialized with the date in the data file.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Exception caught when the error occurred during the reading of the data file.
        InexistentDateException - Exception caught when the date of an event or deadline task present in the data file does not exist.

      • getDeleteTaskString

        public java.lang.String getDeleteTaskString​(Task removedTask,
                                            int index,
                                            Ui ui,
                                            int tasksSize)
        Returns a String representing the data of the data file without the task which need to be removed.
        Parameters:
        removedTask - task to remove from the tasks list and data file.
        index - the position of the removed task.
        ui - Ui which deals with the interactions with the user.
        tasksSize - size of the tasks list after removed the task.
        Returns:
        a String representing the data of the data file without the task which need to be removed.
